text: Carlos Javier Palomino Muñoz, an anti-fascist, was murdered in Madrid, Spain on 11 November 2007. He, aged 16, was travelling to a counter-protest against a far right group. The death occurred at Legazpi Station, where he was stabbed to death. Josué Estébanez de la Hija, the murderer, originated from the Basque Country and was a soldier. He received a 23-year prison sentence. ==References== Category:2007 murders in Europe Category:2000s murders in Spain Category:2007 in Madrid Category:Assassinated activists Category:Assassinated Spanish people Category:Deaths by person in Europe Category:Deaths by stabbing in Spain Category:Filmed assassinations Category:Male murder victims Category:Murdered students Category:Neo-Nazism in Spain Category:People murdered in Spain Category:Spanish anti-fascists Category:Political violence in Spain
title: Murder of Carlos Palomino
